00027 void hcreate ( int isize ){
00028     int i;
00029     ub4 len;
00030     int max_slab;
00031 
00032     len = ((ub4)1<<isize);
00033 
00034     pools_htab = (HTAB *)calloc(1, sizeof(HTAB));
00035     if(pools_htab == NULL){
00036         perror("pools_htab calloc error");
00037         exit(1);
00038     }
00039     pools_htab->mask = len - 1;
00040     pools_htab->logsize = len;
00041     pools_htab->count = 0;
00042     pools_htab->bcount = 0;
00043     pools_htab->lcount = 0;
00044     pools_htab->hit = 0;
00045     pools_htab->miss = 0;
00046     pools_htab->set = 0;
00047     pools_htab->get = 0;
00048     pools_htab->bytes = 0;
00049     bzero(pools_htab->hslab_stat,  sizeof(pools_htab->hslab_stat));
00050 
00051     pools_harug = (HARUG *)calloc(1, sizeof(HARUG));
00052     pools_harug->step = 0;
00053     for(i=0; i < MAX_HARU_POOL; i++){
00054         /*pools_harug->pools_haru_pool[i] = (HARU *)calloc(1, sizeof(HARU));
00055         if(pools_harug->pools_haru_pool[i] == NULL){
00056             perror("pools_haru_pool callo error ");
00057             exit(1);
00058         }*/
00059         pools_harug->haru_pool[i].phitem = NULL;
00060     
00061     }
00062     pools_haru_pool = pools_harug->haru_pool;
00063     
00064     pools_hitem_row = calloc(len, sizeof(ub4));
00065     
00066     hitem_group = (HG *)calloc(1, sizeof(HG));
00067     hitem_group->bucket = pools_htab->logsize;
00068     hitem_group->usable = inithitem ( (ub4) len );
00069     hitem_group->move = NULL;
00070 
00071     pools_hdr = inithdr();
00072 
00073     pools_tlist = (TLIST *)calloc(1, sizeof(TLIST));
00074 
00075     pools_ulist = initulist();
00076 
00077     max_slab = hslabclass();
00078 
00079     if(max_slab > 0){
00080         inithslab ( max_slab );
00081     }
00082 
00083     /*pthread_mutex_init(&work_lock_fslab, NULL);  */
00084     pthread_mutex_init(&work_lock_hit, NULL);
00085     pthread_mutex_init(&work_lock_miss, NULL);
00086     pthread_mutex_init(&work_lock_bytes, NULL);
00087 
00088     pools_fslab = (FSLAB *)calloc(1, sizeof(FSLAB));
00089     pools_fslab->psize = 0;
00090     pools_fslab->sid = 0;
00091     pools_fslab->sa = 0;    
00092     pools_fslab->next = NULL;
00093     return ;
00094 }               /* -----  end of function hcreate  ----- */

00101  */
00102 void inithslab ( int i ){
00103     int m;
00104     pools_hslab = (HSLAB **)calloc(i, sizeof(HSLAB));
00105     for(m=0; m<i; m++){ 
00106         pools_hslab[m] = hslabnull();
00107     }
00108 }               /* -----  end of static function inithslab  ----- */

00110 /* 
00111  * ===  FUNCTION  ======================================================================
00112  *         Name:  hslabnull
00113  *  Description:  
00114  * =====================================================================================
00115  */
00116 HSLAB *hslabnull (  ){
00117     HSLAB *_h;
00118     _h = (HSLAB *)calloc(1, sizeof(HSLAB));
00119     if(_h != NULL){
00120         _h->sm = NULL;
00121         _h->ss = 0;
00122         _h->sf = 0;
00123         _h->id = 0;
00124         _h->next = NULL;
00125     }
00126     return _h;
00127 }               /* -----  end of function hslabnull  ----- */

00129 /* 
00130  * ===  FUNCTION  ======================================================================
00131  *         Name:  hslabcreate
00132  *  Description:  
00133  * =====================================================================================
00134  */
00135 HSLAB *hslabcreate ( int i ){
00136     HSLAB *h;
00137 
00138     h = hslabnull();
00139     h->sm = (ub1 *)calloc(MAX_SLAB_BYTE, sizeof(ub1));
00140     if(!h->sm)perror("h sm calloc error\n"); 
00141     h->sf = slabclass[i].chunk;
00142    
00143     BYTES_LOCK();
00144     pools_htab->bytes += MAX_SLAB_BYTE;    
00145     pools_htab->hslab_stat[i]++;
00146     BYTES_UNLOCK();
00147      
00148     return h;
00149 }               /* -----  end of function hslabcreate  ----- */

00151 /* 
00152  * ===  FUNCTION  ======================================================================
00153  *         Name:  hslabclass
00154  *  Description:  
00155  * =====================================================================================
00156  */
00157 int hslabclass ( void ){
00158     int size = SLAB_BEGIN;
00159     int i=0;
00160     
00161     while (i < MAX_SLAB_CLASS && size <= MAX_SLAB_BYTE / conn_global->factor) {
00162         if (size % CHUNK_ALIGN_BYTES)
00163             size += CHUNK_ALIGN_BYTES - (size % CHUNK_ALIGN_BYTES);
00164         /*if((item_size_max / size) < 2) break; 
00165 
00166         printf("slab class  chunk size %9u perslab %7u\n",
00167                      size, (MAX_SLAB_BYTE / size));*/
00168         slabclass[i].size = size;
00169         slabclass[i].chunk = (MAX_SLAB_BYTE / size);
00170         /*printf("slabclass: size:%d, chunk:%d\n", slabclass[i].size, slabclass[i].chunk);*/
00171         i++;
00172         size *= conn_global->factor;
00173     } 
00174     slabclass[i].size = MAX_SLAB_BYTE;
00175     slabclass[i].chunk = 1;
00176 
00177     return (++i);
00178 }               /* -----  end of function hslabclass  ----- */

00180 /* 
00181  * ===  FUNCTION  ======================================================================
00182  *         Name:  inithitem
00183  *  Description:  
00184  * =====================================================================================
00185  */
00186 HITEM **inithitem ( ub4 len ){
00187     int i;
00188     HITEM **hitem;
00189     hitem = (HITEM **)calloc(len, sizeof(HITEM));
00190     if(hitem == NULL) return NULL;
00191     /* pools_hitem head not store anything */
00192     for (i=0; i<len; ++i) {
00193         hitem[i] = hitemcreate();
00194     }
00195     return hitem;
00196 }               /* -----  end of function inithitem  ----- */

00205 HITEM *hitemcreate(){
00206     HITEM *h;
00207     h = (HITEM *)calloc(1, sizeof(HITEM));
00208     if(h){
00209         h->key = NULL;
00210         h->keyl = 0;
00211         h->drl = 0;
00212         h->psize = 0;
00213         h->sid = 0;
00214         h->sa = 0;
00215         h->hval = 0;
00216         h->hjval = 0;
00217         h->utime = 0;
00218         h->ahit = 0;  
00219         h->amiss = 0;
00220         h->next = NULL;
00221     }
00222     return h;
00223 }               /* -----  end of function hitemcreate  ----- */

00226 /* 
00227  * ===  FUNCTION  ======================================================================
00228  *         Name:  freehitem
00229  *  Description:  
00230  * =====================================================================================
00231  */
00232 void freehitem ( HITEM **_h, ub4 len ){
00233     int i;
00234 
00235     if(!*_h) return;
00236     if(!_h) return;
00237 
00238     for(i=0; i<len; i++){
00239         if(!_h[i]) free(_h[i]);
00240     }
00241 
00242     free(*_h);
00243 
00244 }               /* -----  end of function freehitem  ----- */

00252 HDR **inithdr (  ){
00253     int i;
00254     HDR **d;
00255     d = (HDR **) calloc(conn_global->process_num, sizeof(HDR)); 
00256     
00257     for(i=0; i<conn_global->process_num; i++){
00258         d[i] = hdrcreate();
00259     }
00260     return d; 
00261 }               /* -----  end of function inithdr  ----- */

00291 ULIST **initulist (  ){
00292     ULIST **u;
00293     int i;
00294     u = (ULIST **)calloc(conn_global->process_num, sizeof(ULIST));
00295     for(i=0; i<conn_global->process_num; i++){
00296         u[i] = (ULIST *)calloc(1, sizeof(ULIST));
00297         if(u[i]){
00298             u[i]->key = NULL;
00299             u[i]->keyl = 0;
00300             u[i]->utime = 0;
00301             u[i]->flag = 0;
00302             u[i]->next = NULL;
00303         }
00304     }
00305     return u;
00306 }               /* -----  end of function initulist  ----- */
